name: Berkshire Hathaway
description: According to Trump’s May 2016 Federal Election Commission filing, which provides a range of values for each of his stock holdings, he owns shares in Berkshire Hathaway, run by one of his fiercest critics, Warren Buffett.

stories.description: According to Trump’s May 2016 Federal Election Commission filing, which provides a range of values for each of his stock holdings, he owns shares in Berkshire Hathaway, run by one of his fiercest critics, Warren Buffett.
stories.headline: Trump's Stock Portfolio: Big Oil, Big Banks And More Foreign Connections
